articles.description: Stocks to watch: Bank of Baroda on Saturday reported a robust set of numbers with an 87.7 per cent on-year jump in net profit at Rs 4,070 crore in the June quarter, driven by higher interest income from an above-industry level loan growth and better margins.
articles.content:
